channel.title: [R]Agile Ape (Ape Atoll Agility)
channel.description:
[CENTER] [b]Original post here: http://villavu.com/forum/showthread.php?t=66388[/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/zj0WQ.png[/img]
[size=14pt][url=http://stats.villavu.com/script/172]http://stats.villavu.com/script/172[/url][/size]
[B][U]Description:[/U][/B] Meet Agile Ape, your speedy helper to run that tedious Ape Atoll agility course for you. This script is designed to run the course for hours on in at max speeds with precise accuracy.
[B][U]Features:[/U][/B] [*]Runs the Ape Atoll agility course [*]Eats user-defined food when 60 (or lower) in health [*]Out-of-food recognition [*]Solid break system (By Echo_) with cool graphics! [*]World switching option (Switch worlds after every break) [*]SRL Stats [*]Updated On-Screen progress report [*]Failsafes to ensure endurance
[B][U]How to use:[/U][/B] [*]48+ Agility [*]Must have completed [URL=http://"http://www.tip.it/runescape/?rs2quest_id=82"]Monkey Madness[/URL]. [*]Must have a [URL=http://"http://www.tip.it/runescape/?rs2item_id=9067"]Ninja Greegree[/URL] [*]Start anywhere within the Agility course [*]If you're below level 75 Agility, have the specified food in your inventory
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dKXCc.png[/img]
[/CENTER]
[End Note]:
Because I was in need of an Agility script and enoyhs's doesn't seem to work even converted to R2, I decided to make my own. 70%'ish of the object-handling here was used from enoyhs's script, so think of this as an updated and much improved version of his. The longest part of the script that I worked on the most was probably the on-screen logo. I was doing quite a bit of experimenting with it (as well as a dynamic form, but that a failure in the end...:() and it finally turned out how I had planned.
Because I'm beyond 75 Agility myself, I didn't have the chance to test the eating procedures, but they've yet fail my in my other scripts. If someone would like to give them a go, I'd much appreciate that. Anywho, enjoy the script, post your progress reports, and be sure to report bugs in the script.
To get the script, please visit the original post on Villavu. (Link at the top of this post)
~Cheerz, Flight~

item.title: [R]Agile Ape (Ape Atoll Agility)
item.dc:creator: @Wolf Wolf
item.description:
@Wolf wrote:

[CENTER]
Original post here: http://villavu.com/forum/showthread.php?t=66388

[size=14pt]http://stats.villavu.com/script/172[/size]

Description:
Meet Agile Ape, your speedy helper to run that tedious Ape Atoll agility course for you. This script is designed to run the course for hours on in at max speeds with precise accuracy.

Features:
[]Runs the Ape Atoll agility course
[]Eats user-defined food when 60 (or lower) in health
[]Out-of-food recognition
[]Solid break system (By Echo_) with cool graphics!
[]World switching option (Switch worlds after every break)
[]SRL Stats
[]Updated On-Screen progress report
[]Failsafes to ensure endurance

How to use:
[]48+ Agility
[]Must have completed Monkey Madness.
[]Must have a Ninja Greegree
[]Start anywhere within the Agility course
[*]If you’re below level 75 Agility, have the specified food in your inventory

[/CENTER]

[End Note]:

Because I was in need of an Agility script and enoyhs’s doesn’t seem to work even converted to R2, I decided to make my own. 70%'ish of the object-handling here was used from enoyhs’s script, so think of this as an updated and much improved version of his. The longest part of the script that I worked on the most was probably the on-screen logo. I was doing quite a bit of experimenting with it (as well as a dynamic form, but that a failure in the end…:() and it finally turned out how I had planned.

Because I’m beyond 75 Agility myself, I didn’t have the chance to test the eating procedures, but they’ve yet fail my in my other scripts. If someone would like to give them a go, I’d much appreciate that. Anywho, enjoy the script, post your progress reports, and be sure to report bugs in the script.

To get the script, please visit the original post on Villavu. (Link at the top of this post)

~Cheerz, Flight~
